name: Google Agent Search
description: Advanced web search tool with AI-powered analysis and response generation. Combines multiple search providers (Tavily, SerpAPI) with intelligent content extraction and comprehensive answer synthesis.
author: DurgasAI

input_parameters.name: query
input_parameters.description: Search query to research and analyze

input_parameters.name: num_results
input_parameters.description: Number of search results to analyze (1-20)

input_parameters.name: model
input_parameters.description: AI model to use for response generation

output_parameters.name: comprehensive_response
output_parameters.description: AI-generated comprehensive response with analysis and citations

output_parameters.name: search_results
output_parameters.description: Raw search results with titles, URLs, snippets, and scores

output_parameters.name: citations
output_parameters.description: List of source URLs for citation

output_parameters.name: metadata
output_parameters.description: Search and generation metadata including timestamps and configuration

usage_examples.name: Basic Research Query
usage_examples.description: Simple research question with default settings

input.query: What are the latest developments in quantum computing?

usage_examples.expected_output: Comprehensive response with current quantum computing developments, citations, and analysis

usage_examples.name: Detailed Technical Analysis
usage_examples.description: In-depth technical research with specific model and high result count
usage_examples.expected_output: Detailed technical analysis with multiple sources and comprehensive citations

usage_examples.name: Creative Research
usage_examples.description: Creative research with higher temperature for diverse perspectives
usage_examples.expected_output: Creative and diverse analysis of sustainable energy with multiple viewpoints

common_issues.solution: Check API key configuration for Tavily or SerpAPI
Verify AI model API keys and rate limits
